sentences.sContent: Out of those experiences, everything from pomp to humor to erotic charisma to grief to majesty to the profoundly gruesome and monumentally spiritual worked its way into his tone.
sentences.sContent_eng: Out of those experiences, everything from pomp to humor to erotic charisma to grief to majesty to the profoundly gruesome and monumentally spiritual worked its way into his tone.
sentences.sCn: 撇开这些事不谈，每一件从华丽到幽默，到性爱的魅力，到悲伤，到雄伟，到深沉地阴森和不朽地黑人圣歌都流入他的音调当中。

synos.tran: 威严；最高权威，王权；雄伟；权威

trans.tranCn: 雄伟， 壮丽， 庄严
trans.tranOther: the quality that something big has of being impressive, powerful, or beautiful
